dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: You know, a lot of people think Kazakhstan is just about oil and gas, but President Tokayev is really pushing this digital transformation angle at the Astana International Forum.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You know, a lot of people think Kazakhstan is just about oil and gas, but President Tokayev is really pushing this digital transformation angle at the Astana International Forum.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev is participating in the Astana International Forum (AIF). That is why we continue to build our capacity in key sectors " from digital technologies and artificial intelligence to clean energy and high value-added production, Tokayev told the forum participants.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. He mentioned they're launching the most powerful supercomputer, which has already been delivered to the country. That's a huge step.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. He mentioned they're launching the most powerful supercomputer, which has already been delivered to the country. That's a huge step.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan is launching the most powerful supercomputer, which has already been delivered to the country, Tokayev added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and he talked about turning Kazakhstan into an academic and innovation hub—bringing in foreign universities and research partnerships. It's all part of investing in human capital.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and he talked about turning Kazakhstan into an academic and innovation hub-bringing in foreign universities and research partnerships. It's all part of investing in human capital.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In his speech, the President emphasized that Kazakhstan is investing in human capital by expanding opportunities for young professionals. Our goal is to become an academic and innovation hub, home to branches of foreign universities and research and development partnerships.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and they're not just stopping there. They're creating this thing called CryptoCity, where you can use cryptocurrencies for everyday purchases. That's pretty forward-thinking.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and they're not just stopping there. They're creating this thing called CryptoCity, where you can use cryptocurrencies for everyday purchases. That's pretty forward-thinking.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the President, Kazakhstan also plans to create an innovative pilot zone called CryptoCity, where cryptocurrencies will be used to buy goods, services, and more.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It is, but it also raises questions about security, right? Tokayev emphasized the need for data confidentiality and quality, especially with that data lake of 87 national databases they've already built.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It is, but it also raises questions about security, right? Tokayev emphasized the need for data confidentiality and quality, especially with that data lake of eighty seven national databases they've already built.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He emphasized the need for access to data, as well as ensuring its security, confidentiality, and quality. The government has already created a data lake " a collection of 87 national databases.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Mhm, and Rostislav Konyashkin from National Information Technologies explained that the supercomputer isn't starting from scratch—it's building on existing server tech, but aiming for world-class level, like what AMD or Nvidia are doing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mhm, and Rostislav Konyashkin from National Information Technologies explained that the supercomputer isn't starting from scratch-it's building on existing server tech, but aiming for world-class level, like what A M D or Nvidia are doing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Former chairman of National Information Technologies (NIT) Rostislav Konyashkin previously explained what the supercomputer would be used for. Simply put, a supercomputer is a set of server equipment " some of which we already use, though built on slightly different technologies. Currently, world leaders in this area are former graphics card manufacturers like AMD and Nvidia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So it's really about catching up fast and becoming a magnet for digital talent globally. I mean, he said their success in all areas depends on digital tech development.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So it's really about catching up fast and becoming a magnet for digital talent globally. I mean, he said their success in all areas depends on digital tech development.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We need to turn our country into a magnet for digital nomads from around the world. Our success in all areas depends on how quickly and effectively we develop new digital technologies, the President said earlier.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And reducing regional disparities is a top priority too—strengthening the middle class by expanding opportunities in sectors from AI to clean energy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And reducing regional disparities is a top priority too-strengthening the middle class by expanding opportunities in sectors from A I to clean energy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our top priority is to reduce regional disparities and strengthen the middle class. That is why we continue to build our capacity in key sectors " from digital technologies and artificial intelligence to clean energy and high value-added production, Tokayev told the forum participants.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's ambitious, but you gotta admire the focus. They're not just talking; they're delivering hardware and creating zones like CryptoCity to test new ideas.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's ambitious, but you gotta admire the focus. They're not just talking; they're delivering hardware and creating zones like CryptoCity to test new ideas.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It makes you wonder if other resource-rich countries will follow suit and diversify into tech this aggressively.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It makes you wonder if other resource-rich countries will follow suit and diversify into tech this aggressively.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. Keeping up with the times means not resting on your laurels, and Kazakhstan seems to get that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. Keeping up with the times means not resting on your laurels, and Kazakhstan seems to get that.
